screen_desc: The screenshot shows the search history on a Google search bar from an Android device. It includes a list of past search queries such as "plane crash student pilot," "student loans loan forgiveness," "willow smith snl performance," and "art laboe radio station," the last of which includes an accompanying image of Art Laboe. Below the search bar, there are quick access icons to popular Google apps like Gmail, Clock, Calendar, Maps, and Drive. The device status bar indicates it's 8:42 with various connectivity and battery icons present.

Press enter to execute the search
Select a link to the latest video from the BBC website or YouTube
